name: SpeDieCy
description:
A dicey platformer where you play as a die & the number facing up corresponds to the number of jumps you have (1 = normal jump, 2 = double jump, etc.).
You can jump as many times as the number facing up on the die.

You can control the die in the main menu screen to experiment with the movement mechanics.

Controls
Keyboard:
Use [W] [A] [S] [D] to move and [Space] to jump.

Gamepads:
Left thumbstick to move & bottom face button (A button on Xbox controller) to jump.
Gamepad controls don't work for the menu navigation.
